mapper.select: select id, section, title, direction, usher_title, usher_direction from batch_direction where section = #{section}
mapper.insert: insert into batch_direction( created, modified, section, title, direction, usher_title, usher_direction ) values ( now(), now(), #{section}, #{title}, #{direction}, #{usher_title}, #{usher_direction} )
mapper.update: update batch_direction set title = #{title}, direction = #{direction}, usher_title = #{usher_title}, usher_direction = #{usher_direction} where id = #{id}
